title: 3 THINGS I CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT! #ad #ShopWithYouTube
description: 3 things I can't live without #ad. By the way, I earn a commission from items purchased through this video! #shopwithyoutube Every single day I wake up and put on my pants one leg at a time, just like everyone else. But what goes in my pockets?! Today we finally get the answer. Besides my keys and phone of course, I *always* carry a JerryRig Razor knife, a 250 lumen rechargeable Milwaukee penlight, AND a Ridge wallet. All of which are shoppable on this Youtube Short. Just click the shopping button on screen!
transcript: What does a do-it-yourselfer like myself carry in his pockets every single day? Ill show you! Huge thanks to YouTube for Sponsoring this short. Everything you see here is shoppable down below. Lets start with the JerryRigEverything Knife - incredibly useful! Second thing we have is a 250 lumen Milwaukee penlight with a built in laser! As well as a rubber tip so I can hold it in my mouth while working with my hands. And Finally for the past four years, i've kept a Ridge Wallet in my pocket because its slim, lightweight, and holds the cash I need. YouTube is making it way easier to shop on videos like this on while watching the video! There is a little shopping button right here! that gives you instant access to all of these items. Whether its stuff I sell like the JerryRigEverything knife, or stuff that link, creators also get a commission from the stuff they link. And of course viewers like you get instant access to all of this while watching the video. Game changing.
